title: A plea for the late accurate and excellent Mr. Baxter and those that speak of the sufferings of Christ as he does. In answer to Mr. Lobb's insinuated charge of Socinianism against 'em, in his late appeal to the Bishop of Worcester, and Dr. Edwards. With a preface directed to persons of all persuasions, to call 'em from frivolous and over-eager contentions about words, on all sides.
author: Lobb, Stephen, d. 1699.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for J[ohn] Lawrence, at the Angel in the Poultry,
